question: If the curve passes through the point (1, 1) and at any point (x, y) on the curve, the product of the slope of its tangent and x co-ordinate of the point is equal to the y co-ordinate of the point, then the curve also passes through the point
explanation: <katex>$x \frac{dy}{dx} = y \implies \frac{dy}{y} = \frac{dx}{x} \implies \ln y = \ln x + c \implies y = kx$</katex>.
